import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update location images"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/{locationId}/images"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the image files associated with a location. This operation replaces the existing image associations - files not included in the request will be disassociated.

**Workflow:**
1. Upload image files using the file upload endpoints first
2. Obtain FileIds from the upload responses
3. Call this endpoint with the FileIds and optional descriptions

**Note:** This endpoint manages the association between files and the location. The files themselves must be uploaded separately.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"locationId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the location","example":"aa632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication","example":"Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for updating file associations on an entity (location floorplans, images, etc.)","properties":{"FileData":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"File metadata associated with an entity (location, room, etc.). Used for floorplans, images, and other file attachments.","properties":{"FileId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the file"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description or caption for the file"}},"required":["FileId"],"title":"EntityFileDetail"},"description":"Array of file details to associate with the entity. Existing files not in this list will be removed."}},"required":["FileData"],"title":"UpdateEntityFileDetailsRequest"},"example":{"FileData":[{"FileId":"11632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80","Description":"Building exterior - front entrance (updated)"},{"FileId":"44632d8d-486f-ed11-ade6-cc60c8b5ca80","Description":"New cafeteria renovation"}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
